page.title: 18THE QUERNMORE GAMEKEEPER 2
page.content: The grouse moor is 12,000 acres.This year the Duke has been shooting the full six days but it usually depends on how busy he is.The average number of grouse shot in a day depends on the weather.There are normally 8 people in a shooting party with two teams of beaters each of 12 people.The beaters move around the area and beat the bushes to make the birds come out of them.The shooters then shoot the birds as they fly off. The hours Mr Ozerkowski works depends entirely on what season it is. He has had the job as a gamekeeper for 5 years part time and this is his 2nd year full time.The busiest month for shooting is August.He has always been interested in wildlife,therefore gamekeeping seemed the perfect job for him and he thoroughly enjoys it.
